original_text:
When Elijah heard it, he pulled his cloak over his face and went out and stood at the mouth of the cave.
Then a voice said to him, “What are you doing here, Elijah?”
korean_text: 엘리야가 듣고 겉옷으로 얼굴을 가리고 나가 굴 어귀에 서매 소리가 그에게 임하여 이르시되 엘리야야 네가 어찌하여 여기 있느냐

sentences.original_text: he pulled his cloak over his face
and stood at the mouth of the cave
Then a voice said to him
What are you doing here, Elijah?
sentences.korean_translation: 엘리야야, 너는 여기서 무엇을 하고 있느냐?
